content.prompt: Which of the following best summarizes the advice given by Frederick William in the first paragraph?

choices.label: A good leader should instill fear in the population.
It is not necessary to tolerate other religions.
Exploit the church for the enrichment of the state.
Helping the people will strengthen the state.
